name: Sunspot
description:
Escape the dark abandoned flower shop filled with monsters and dangerous pitfalls! Traverse the area with your shine ability to help you see your surroundings!

Directions:

------------------------------------

You can use WASD and spacebar for movement, or use your Arrow keys to move

Shine Ability:

------------------------------------

Hold SHIFT to use ability

Stand still to recharge ability normally. Moving slows down recharge rate
